content:
Probably looking for a peaceful place,
to focus on my research.
<size=28>Traveling is nice, but it's too exhausting.</size>

<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>, it's you.
Though the journey had its ups and downs,
looking around now, it was all worth it!

Grassy meadows, flower patches, by the rippling shore...
Hmm? I'm looking for
a perfect spot to pitch my tent. What about you?

I wonder what made <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color> join the relocation program?
As for me...
